p.span: We follow the Indiana State Standards with a hands-on approach focusing on STEAM. We provide a balanced education for the whole child not just test prep. Your child is so much more than a number at

Students participate in weekly; Gardening, Art, Character Education, Music,Library and Physical Education. Every child receives 60 minutes of recess daily. Plus we value your family time; that is why we have a NO homework policy. We do encourage students to read 20 minutes daily and study for tests.
